energy.usef.core.service.business

Class MessageFilterService

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.service.business.MessageFilterService

  • public class MessageFilterService
extends Object
    Service class in charge of filtering incoming HTTP messages and, based on the denylisted addresses (IP or EA), accept or reject them.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • filterMessage

        public void filterMessage(String senderDomain,
                          String hostlist)
                   throws BusinessException
        Filter an incoming message. The message will be rejected if the sender's address is in the deny list.
        Parameters:
        senderDomain - - The domain of the received message
        hostlist - - A string containing hostnames/IP addresses of the sender, separated by ','
        Throws:
        BusinessException

        Returns:
